title: WEATHER ALERT; Advisory for heavy rain
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa, and Southern provinces.
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in the Uva province and Ampara district during the evening or night.
Winds speed can increase up to 40 kmph at times in the Northern, North-central, North-western, and Southern provinces.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
(VIDEO) Police attempt to deploy riot unit at GotaGoGama, Protestors force them back
